message.content:
cs.LO, cs.PL, cs.SE, cs.FL, cs.CR

The paper deals with the specification and inference of trace refinement relations, which involves reasoning about the behavior of programs over time. This topic is closely related to several areas of computer science, including logic (cs.LO), programming languages (cs.PL), software engineering (cs.SE), formal methods (cs.FL), and cryptography (cs.CR). However, given the focus on program behavior and verification, we believe that cs.LO and cs.PL are the most likely categories, followed by cs.SE, cs.FL, and cs.CR.
